headline: Trump Slashed Solar Credits. First Solar, Sunrun Are Winners Anyway, Analyst Says.
summary: Mizuho Securities reiterated Outperform ratings and lifted price targets for First Solar, Sunrun, and Bloom Energy.

raw.headline: Trump Slashed Solar Credits. First Solar, Sunrun Are Winners Anyway, Analyst Says.
raw.summary: Mizuho Securities reiterated Outperform ratings and lifted price targets for First Solar, Sunrun, and Bloom Energy.

headline: First Solar: America-First Approach And Structural Risks Trigger Mixed Thesis
summary: First Solar is the market leader in the US solar segment due to its robust backlog through 2030 and 14 GW nameplate manufacturing capacity domestically. Learn more on FSLR stock here.

raw.headline: First Solar: America-First Approach And Structural Risks Trigger Mixed Thesis

headline: Mizuho cuts ratings on Fluence, Nextracker, Shoals, Enlight after energy bill
summary: Investing.com -- Mizuho Securities downgraded several clean energy companies in response to President Trump’s One Big Beautiful Bill (OBBB), which reshapes the federal energy subsidy landscape, in a note dated Monday.
